title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's fit, noting it hits just above the knees and has sleeves of the perfect length, while finding it immensely comfortable and not itchy at all. The dress receives positive feedback for its looks, soft material, and quality, with customers particularly appreciating the pockets. However, the material thickness receives mixed reviews - while some find it thick like leggings, others say it's too thin and see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little dress
items.body: Very cute dress. Looks well made. Fits great and is very soft and comfortable. Fabric quality is better than I expected and thicker. Haven't worn it in cooler weather, but it seems like it would be warm. I love how soft it is inside. I also love the pockets. I would definitely buy again. Read more
items.author: J.B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The WORST review for a dress that shows my nips if I don’t know how to dress myself
items.body: This dress is soooo soft! It is a bit thinner and more unstructured than pictured. I have worn it twice, both times with an additional long sweater in tow as I live in Chicago and the weather in October has an identity crisis every year. It was also the perfect weight for my crazy peri nonsense. Hot/cold/hot/cold, and now it’s all your fault, wait, no, it’s mine. Everything makes me sad, angry, hot, or cold. Or something in between and no one can explain any of it. I swear!! Anyway, this dress was awesome to wear to make me feel kinda fancy while still pajama comfortable. (THE ideal clothing!!) Tights or leggings with some bootie heels (mine were small wedge), and a nice longish necklace. The buttons seem to be made out of really nice polished coconut shell. Might be wrong, but it’s a nice touch even though they are decorative only. It also has good pockets! I should’ve put that first. I may have gotten a size too large. I was 5’9” at 20. Thirty years later, apparently I am now 5’6.7”. What!?!? I don’t believe that. Also, as of the same dr visit I am 206lbs. That seems unreal except for when I try to stand from a kneel without a sturdy object to leverage myself. I did quit smoking last year. Anyway: Fantastic value! Leave me one!! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute for Teachers
items.body: Great dress. I am usually between sizes and ordered down based on reviews but wished I ordered a size larger. Have it 4 stars as the material pulled on day 1 of wearing it when I put a bag on my shoulder. Still super cute and very comfy and warm. Read more
items.author: Dennis Montone

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, stretchy, and, POCKETS!!
items.body: Bought this to wear red to work in honor of Charlie Kirk & freedom. It is just cozy enough without being hot working in an active office all day. Soft & stretchy, but still has a little structure. I won’t even mention - but just did - POCKETS!!! I wouldn’t put a bunch of stuff in the pockets because anything over an AirPods case and/or key fob definitely distorts the shape of the dress. My phone in the pocket made it look pretty weird, but it definitely fit lol. For reference, 5’6”, 148 & I sized down to a small. It fit perfectly. I did pair it with black leggings because it’s a little cooler out. Read more
items.author: Melissa McBurney

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin fabric
items.body: This dress is very thin. You can see the lines from bra, underwear, tights, etc. right through, even though it sits very loosely on me. Pockets are nice to have, but in this case, you can also see them through the dress. I am not overweight, but this dress makes me look fat. It also needs ironing, but wrinkles immediately and stretches anywhere you touch it. The color I chose is nice; it’s deep red. Read more
items.author: Julia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little dress
items.body: Dress is as described. On the thinner side but still super cute. The buttons on the side add a little whimsy I am 5’5 and 125#. I ordered a small and it fits me. Not tight, not too big. Read more
items.author: Christina Atkins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fanulous!
items.body: LOVE THIS! It is comfortable and flattering! Read more
items.author: Maria Sinclair

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress
items.body: Super cute and flattering dress. I’ll wear it with black tights and black boots. I ordered the red buffalo plaid. The material is super soft. Almost like a kids pajama material. The fit is true to size. I’m 5’4” and weight 130lbs. I ordered a size small. Perfect fit. Read more
items.author: Souzaah

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Grey White, Dark Grey, Gl- Multicolor Stripes, Black, Camel, Coffee, Ei0941- Red, Gs- Christmas Elk, Eg- Black White Grid, Gt- Deep Caramel, Gu- Deep Rose Purple, Ge- Light Grey, Ec- Burn Red, Ef- Chocolate. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
